parameters.query:
SELECT 
  e.id as email_id,
  e.email_id as gmail_id,
  e.from_email,
  e.to_email,
  e.subject,
  e.body_text,
  c.id as classification_id,
  c.category,
  c.subcategory,
  c.priority,
  c.summary,
  d.name as department_name,
  d.id as department_id,
  s.response_time_hours
FROM automation_email_classifier.emails e
JOIN automation_email_classifier.classifications c ON c.email_id = e.id
JOIN automation_email_classifier.departments d ON d.id = c.department_id
LEFT JOIN automation_email_classifier.slas s ON s.department_id = d.id 
  AND s.ticket_type = 'ADMINISTRATIVO' 
  AND s.priority = c.priority
WHERE e.status = 'classified'
  AND c.category = 'ADMINISTRATIVO'
  AND c.requires_ticket = true
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM automation_email_classifier.tickets t 
    WHERE t.email_id = e.id
  )
ORDER BY c.priority DESC, e.received_at ASC
LIMIT 5;

INSERT INTO automation_email_classifier.tickets (
  email_id, classification_id, ticket_number, ticket_source,
  ticket_status, department_id, priority, sla_deadline,
  created_at, updated_at
)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, NOW(), NOW())
RETURNING id;

UPDATE automation_email_classifier.emails
SET 
  status = 'ticket_created',
  ticket_created_at = NOW(),
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = $1;
